summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of 1647, for the improvement of Cherry Street, in the City of Seattle, from Third Avenue to Fourth Avenue, by paving the same with sandstone blocks laid upon a proper concrete foundation, and by constructing granite curbs and concrete sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 17449 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
